He's a pianist. He explained to us regarding a piece by Haydn "this passage should be played beautifully rather than rhythmically. Otherwise it's a bit cheap." The referee could've stopped the match which would've been a cheap triumph for anthony but fortunately he didn't. We also watched a comedy show which was full of cheap laughs.
